Class PrologTauAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.TauAnalyzer<swiprolog3.language.PrologTerm,PrologAtom,swiprolog3.language.PrologUpdate>

  • public class PrologTauAnalyzer
extends TauAnalyzer<swiprolog3.language.PrologTerm,PrologAtom,swiprolog3.language.PrologUpdate>
    Represents a transition analysis tool set when the Prolog KRT is used.
    Author:
    sungshik
